snippet.title: Secret Agent Mission One walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - JOR-AND)
snippet.description:
This was a graphics adventure game written by JOR-AND for the Apple ][. The black and white graphics was quite primitive, but more elegant than some of the color graphics adventure games in the 80s. The game has an interesting storyline and featured some animations.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is partially completed by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Walkthrough - www.textfiles.com
